content.howToPlay:
There are three steps in this preparation process. Apply cosmetics first, style the witch’s hair, then finish the look by selecting her witch hat.

Makeup: It all starts with the eyes. Select the witch's eye color initially. You will see many different eye hues. After selecting your favorite hue, apply the remaining cosmetics. Smokey eyeshadow is our favorite color. It's time to choose her lipstick after applying eye shadow. Select the one that most closely matches the witch's lip color. The blushes then come in peach or pink shades. Make sure it complements the lipstick, though. When selecting brow form and eye color, take aesthetics into account.Hair: Now is the moment to discuss hair. Here, choose the color and give her hair shape. If you'd like, you can add a second color layer to the hair. After her hair is done, choose the necklace and earrings she will wear.Dress Up: In the last part, make her wear a magnificent dress and complement it with a cloak! Make the witch put her fearful cloak on. And, of course, the hat! There is no witch without a witch hat. She is ready now for the party!
